name: Minego
description:
This game is created for the game jam: GameDevNetwork: Gooseberry Jam || THEME: YOU Are The Villain

It is a 2-player platformer game. Have fun trapping cooperating with and killing helping your partner and get higher scores :)

This game is still mainly a prototype of our idea, and more stages are coming in the future. Hope you like it!

This game is completely OPEN-SOURCED on GitHub: https://github.com/Commoon/Minego

PS: It should be supported on Linux and Mac OS but I temporarily don't have an environment to compile it. Perhaps I'll upload later.
